game.name: Powers Downtown
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Powers Downtown is a turn-based combat RPG that features a unique fighting system. Your objective is to roam the rooftops of the city, battle enemies of varying abilities and gain experience when defeating enemies. Search for strong fighters to recruit and build a formidable team.
